com.hv15.aperi.interfaces

Interface DatabaseListener


  • public interface DatabaseListener
    Interface for the SocketServer to interact with the SQLite Database
    Author:
    Hans-Nikolai Viessmann
    See Also:
    SocketService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClient(String mac, String ip)
      Add a new client to the database, or update an existing entry
      void clearClients()
      Drop the table in the database
      void delClient(String mac)
      Delete a client from the database
      ArrayList<String[]> getClients()
      Get a list of clients

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        void addClient(String mac,
             String ip)
        Add a new client to the database, or update an existing entry
        Parameters:
        mac - The device's MAC address
        ip - The device's IP address

      • delClient

        void delClient(String mac)
        Delete a client from the database
        Parameters:
        mac - MAC address of device to be removed

      • clearClients

        void clearClients()
        Drop the table in the database

        This should only be done when the session is over

      • getClients

        ArrayList<String[]> getClients()
        Get a list of clients
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String arrays, format {mac, ip}
